item.title: Learning More Abuot HTMX
item.description: htmx in a Nutshell linkhtmx is a library that allows you to access modern browser features directly from HTML, rather than using javascript. To understand htmx, first let’s take a look at an anchor tag: <a href="/blog">Blog</a> This anchor tag tells a browser: “When a user clicks on this link, issue an HTTP GET request to ‘/blog’ and load the response content into the browser window”. With that in mind, consider the following bit of HTML:
